moves.1. Nc3 Nc6 2. Nf3 Nf6 3. Ne5 Ne4 4. Nxc6: This was to put my bishop on the attack...
moves.10. Rf1: ...and this was to repel the bishop.
moves.14... Rf8: This move only allows the king to move between d8 (on the bishop's attack line) and e8.
moves.15. Re7+ Kd8 16. Rxg7+: This allows me to remove a pawn
I decide to retire my rook, having obliterated my opponent's left-hand pawns. My right-hand side is now wide open.
This was to pin the bishop down
moves.32. Ke1 Rxg2 33. Rxd7+: Why did my opponent resign after this?

gameName: No queens or knights... how will you do? II
